comment.author: 8348059@N02
comment._content: Photo is of Felix Weingartner (1863-1942), Austrian conductor and composer. The news photo may relate to his appearances in the USA with the Boston Opera in 1912 and 1913.

comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: He reminds me of Christopher Walken.

comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: LOC, you need to fix your caption and title for this photo. As Andy961 pointed out, it's FELIX Weingartner, not Felia.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Andy961 and Cynthia Wenslow: Thanks for pointing out the more likely reading of the name on the negative and the likely identity of the subject.  We'll adjust the information in our source data and then reload it to Flickr.
